info.title: Unified SAFIS API -Test
info.description:
**Overview**

This API is used by remote applications   to communicate with the SAFIS backend database server. It is not intended for any other purpose. This document is intended as a programmerâ€™s reference manual. It is used by both application developers who build a front-end, and the programmers who maintain this   API back-end. 

To request an API key, please contact support@accsp.org.

post.description: This call retrieves a list of fisher or dealer permits for the logged in user with a valid username, password and API key.
call to download a users stored favorites on eTrips online
fetch the last date that the specified lookup table(s) were changed.
send a set of trips rows to safis

/neg_trips_upload.summary: send a set of negative / no fishing trip reports to safis

post.description: send a set of negative / no fishing trip reports to safis.
send a set of trip location data rows to safis
fetch a set of rows for specified attribute lookup list. Used in combination with _additional_attributes lookup_list

trip.description: trip level information. Either of state_reg_nbr or coast_guard_nbr is required.

trip_start_date.description: calendar date of beginning of fishing trip. Format MM/DD/YYYY

trip_type.description: Trip Type undertaken. Commercial (C), Recreational (R), For Hire-Charter(A), For Hire-Headboat (H)

trip_start_time.description: calendar time of start of fishing trip. Format hh24:mi

trip_end_time.description: calendar time of end of fishing trip. Format MM/DD/YYYY

vessel_permit.description: Vessel Permit number of vessel in use

vtr_number.description: Vessel Trip Report number. Auto-generated by the application

trip_activity.description: Indicator for intended/final outcome of fishing trip

coast_guard_nbr.description: Coast Guard Number/Hull Number of vessel

supplier_trip_id.description: unique trip id given by the caller. Only used to communicate errors and updates.

iss_agency.description: 4 character identifier of issuing agency of permit in use

cf_license_nbr.description: Permit/License Number of Permit in use.

license_nbr.description: Permit/License number given by the issuing agency

license_type.description: License type as defined by the issuing agency

permit_type.description: Permit type as defined by ACCSP.

description.description: Human readable description of the status reason or failure.

event_id.description: unique ID of this upload process

upload_date.description: date the upload was received by server. Format MM/DD/YYYY hh24:mi

process_date.description: date the server completed processing upload request. Format MM/DD/YYYY hh24:mi

total_count.description: Number of trips found in the upload

errored_count.description: Number of trips NOT processed due to one or more errors

supplier_trip_id.description: unique supplier id for supplied to the upload

accsp_trip_id.description: accsp internal identifier for this matching the supplier trip id

description.description: Human readable description of the status reason or failure.

row.help_text: Choose one or more targeted species.

supplier_row_id.description: unique identifier given by sender. Useful for updating information and retrieving errors.

iss_agency.description: 4 digit identification of the issuing agency of permit

start_date.description: start date of the negative/no fishing report

end_date.description: last date of negative report if a range is being given

cf_license_nbr.description: license number given by issuing agency

event_id.description: the unique job-id/event_id for this upload assigned by the system

total_count.description: total count of neg trip records received.

errored_count.description: total count of neg trip records that were not processed due to one or more errors.

description.description: Human readable description of the status reason or failure

p_supplier_trip_id.description: unique trip id given by the requesting entity

p_vendor_id.description: vendor id of the device sending records

trip_id.description: ACCSP Trip id of the record that was matched.

supplier_trip_id.description: Associated supplier_trip that was given in the request.

total_count.description: Total number of location records that were passed into the upload.

description.description: Human readable description of the status reason or failure.

p_partner.description: 4 character issuing agency of the attributes list

p_attribute.description: attribute code corresponding to attribute_code given by lookup_list

p_lastdate.description: the earliest date filter for the list request. Format MM/DD/YYYY hh24:mi:ss

comm_flag.description: indicator flag for whether element is needed for Commercial Trip.

for_hire_charter_flag.description: indicator flag for whether element is needed for For-Hire Charter Trip.

for_hire_hb_flag.description: indicator flag for whether element is needed for For-Hire Headboat Trip.

rec_flag.description: indicator flag for whether element is needed for Recreational Trip.

description.description: Human readable description of the status reason or failure.

p_partner.description: 4 character value of permit issuing agency

p_listnames.description:
One or more list names from:

GEARS,
GEAR_ATTRIBUTES,
TRIP_ADDITIONAL_ATTRIBUTES,
EFFORT_ADDITIONAL_ATTRIBUTES, 
PARTNER_MANAGED_SPECIES, 
DISPOSITION, 
AREASFISHED, 
SPECIES, 
CATCH_SOURCE, 
USER_NOTIFICATIONS, 
PARTICIPANTS, 
VESSELS,
SWIPE_CARDS, 
TRIP_ACTIVITY, 
PORTS , 
DEALERS, 
PARTNER_MANAGED_NOTIFICATIONS, 
SALE_DISPOSITIONS_ADDITIONAL_ATTRIBUTES

last_date.description: last modified date of requested list. Format MM/DD/YYYY hh24:mi:ss

description.description: Human readable description of the status reason or failure.

lookup_list_body.description: Fetch a list of valid values for a specified list noted in p_listname above. Returned as a JSON encoded object. If no rows exist, there will be no data, and status record will indicate zero errors

p_partner.description: 4 character value of permit issuing agency
4 character value of permit issuing agency
